title: Maximiliano de Habsburgo
body: He is the brother of the late former Emperor of Austria and former King of Hungary, Charles of Habsburg, and arrived in Madeira on April 17, 1922, on the English steamer Kenilworth Castle, going to stay in Monte, at the house of his sister-in-law, the former Empress Zita. He left for Lisbon on the English steamer Arcoma on April 26, 1922, and then went from there to Spain.

Charles de Habsburg: Former Emperor of Austria and former King of Hungary
